EmailTemplate.name: Alert to Reynold's Dealers
EmailTemplate.subject: Alert to All Reynolds dealers using VinSolutions. ACTION REQUIRED!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, In response to the need to support multiple vehicle statuses via RCI integration, Reynolds & Reynolds is releasing enhancements to the Reynolds Certified Interface (RCI) Friday night. By Saturday evening, the majority of Reynolds dealers should have this enhancement in place.
The enhancement will allow inventory to be screened by Status group, instead of just by status. For example – you may choose to include in your inventory feed to VinSolutions, all vehicles in account status 1,2 3, and 4. Currently the only Status Code included is 1. After the enhancement, and with proper configuration on behalf of the dealer, all statuses included in the status group “IN STOCK” will be transmitted to VinSolutions. This “IN STOCK” status group can be controlled in the following screens:
New vehicle status groups are set up in screen 4158.
Pre Owned vehicle status groups are set up in screen 4162.
Important: When this update is in place, Reynolds & Reynolds will only be providing VinSolutions with inventory that is included in the Status Group “IN STOCK”.
For assistance in validating the inventory in your VinSolutions account or general questions regarding this enhancement, please contact support at 913.825.6300 opt 2, or email us at support@vinsolutions.com.
For assistance in configuring your status group in Reynolds, please Reynolds TAC at :
U.S. Dealers: 800-767-0080
Canadian Dealers: 800-661-8600
We appreciate your assistance in coordinating this effort. Thank you for choosing VinSolutions.
